resources.string: any sound-file found on your SD

Programmed by Michael Wodniok.
Please send bugs and ideas to michix5d@gmail.com. Please send destructive critic and so on to someone else.

Development together with the PaDS-Lab at FH Schmalkalden. Thanks to Stefan Kunze (alias: kunze) and Marcus Denison (alias: fattrat) for writing a REST-Service and Spirit-Platform. Without that services would it be very hard or even impossible to write this app. Additionally thanks to Lynus Apel, Michael Dragunski, Philip Ekert and Siegmund Wodniok for every-day-tests.

Used tools:
- Eclipse
- OpenJDK 7
- Eclipse JDT
- Eclipse ADT
- Android SDK Rev. 14
- Inkscape
If you want to use the schedule, you have to set your course here:
For following events you can set a group-filter:

The "penetrant mode" is enabled. In this mode, the alarm only can shut up if you select the right answer for a really simple mathematical exercise. Alternatively you can kill the app or your phone. Additionally, you cannot varry the sound-volume.
It seems so, that a new semester has started. Maybe you have to set some new settings.
Currently, there is no schedule available. Download a schedule via [MENU] > "schedule-schedule" and set there some group-filters.
Click here to get back to the countdown…
Please set a group [min. 0 (= event disabled), max. %1$d] for %2$s:
A error has been occured while refreshing schedule.\n\n%1$s: %2$s

Welcome to the Spirit4Android-app. This app loads automatically from the Spirit-platform and shows you an actual schedule for one course. Additionally, there is a built-in alarm-function.

Before you use the app:
The app is under development. Before a version will be released, it will get checked but there is no warranty for a correct working app.
While using the app, it will load data through the internet. This can create costs made by your provider. The app is licensed under CC-BY_SA 3.0. This expicitly allows to copy the app and give it to your friends. More details about licensing are located at www.spirit4android.de.tc (only german)
i have read, understood the license terms and accept them.
i have not read, not understood, disagree the terms of or dont want to read the license.
Please set the time (in minutes) the alarm should ring before your first event on a day.
